Proof.

  unfold refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout.
  intros net h st' ps' gd out d l H1 H2 H3 H4 H5.
  apply H2 in H1.
  destruct H1 as [H6 _].
  apply H2 in H6.
  destruct H6 as [H7 _].
  rewrite H7 in H5.
  inversion H5; subst.
  apply refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_update_elections_data_timeout in H4.
  apply H4.
  apply H2 in H1.
  destruct H1 as [H8 _].
  apply H2 in H8.
  destruct H8 as [H9 _].
  apply H9 in H7.
  destruct H7 as [H10 _].
  apply H10 in H6.
  destruct H6 as [H11 _].
  apply H11 in H5.
  destruct H5 as [H12 _].
  apply H12 in H4.
  destruct H4 as [H13 _].
  apply H13 in H3.
  destruct H3 as [H14 _].
  apply H14 in H2.
  destruct H2 as [H15 _].
  apply H15 in H1.
  destruct H1 as [H16 _].
  apply H16 in H.
  destruct H as [H17 _].
  apply H17.
Qed.
